name: 创建sqlserver互联项

parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'name': '创建sqlserver互联项', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(cms_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/connection', 'method': 'post', 'json': {'id': None, 'name': 'sqlserver${get_random_number(1000,9999)}', 'connectionType': 1, 'databaseType': 3, 'authenticationType': 1, 'server': '${get_config(sqlserver,host)}', 'port': 1433, 'database': '${get_config(sqlserver,database)}', 'databasePath': '', 'userName': '${get_config(sqlserver,user)}', 'password': '${get_config(sqlserver,password)}', 'changedPassword': True, 'mqttType': None, 'pushType': None, 'timingPeriod': None, 'changingPeriod': None, 'cloudDeviceId': '', 'originalSecret': ''}, 'headers': {'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'extract': {'sqlserver_intn_id': 'id'}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}]}

parameterValues: {'name': '创建sqlserver互联项', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(cms_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/connection', 'method': 'post', 'json': {'id': None, 'name': 'sqlserver${get_random_number(1000,9999)}', 'connectionType': 1, 'databaseType': 3, 'authenticationType': 1, 'server': '${get_config(sqlserver,host)}', 'port': 1433, 'database': '${get_config(sqlserver,database)}', 'databasePath': '', 'userName': '${get_config(sqlserver,user)}', 'password': '${get_config(sqlserver,password)}', 'changedPassword': True, 'mqttType': None, 'pushType': None, 'timingPeriod': None, 'changingPeriod': None, 'cloudDeviceId': '', 'originalSecret': ''}, 'headers': {'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'extract': {'sqlserver_intn_id': 'id'}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}]}
